page.title: 14Buxhall - Travel to Shops
page.content: There are no shops within the area although a{mobile shop}serves the area once a week. The nearest shops are the {general stores}in Finborough (combined with{Post Office}) and Rattlesden both at 2.5km and providing an excellent range of goods and services (eg Dry cleaning deliveries). Bulk shopping is generally done in Stowmarket usually at weekends or late Friday evening when the family car may be available. There is a{weekly bus service}to Stowmarket on market day (Thursday) which gives 2hrs in the town. This service is also used to visit friends and family in Stowmarket. One other{bus service}skirts the edge of Buxhall village, to Bury St Edmunds on market day (Wednesday) giving 3hrs in the town.
